#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define MAX 100005
using namespace std;
typedef long long int ll;
int main()
{
    ll n,q,i,l,r,a[MAX];
    cin>>n;
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        cin>>a[i];
    cin>>q;
    while(q--)
    {
        bool k=false;
        cin>>l>>r;
        for(i=l;i<r-1;i++)
        {
            if(a[i]>a[l-1])
            {k=true;break;}
        }
        if(k) cout<<"NO"<<endl;
        else cout<<"YES"<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
